Detailed Description

IPMP tool manager.

IPMP tool manager within a terminal.

Definition at line 400 of file IPMPToolManager.h.

IPMPMessageFromTool **  out
)  [virtual]
 

Process input message and return response in out.

Warning:
This function must be thread safe.

Response may be 0, if none was created.

Parameters:
in input, input message.
out output, response message.
Returns:
Boolean indicating success or failure.

Implements DRMPlugin::MPEG2IPMPXDRMPlugin::IPMPAgent.

virtual const Bit32T& DRMPlugin::MPEG2IPMPXDRMPlugin::IPMPToolManager::IPMPIdentifier (   )  const [virtual]
 

IPMP agent identifier.

Identifier 0 represents IPMP terminal, others represent IPMP descriptor identifiers of IPMP tools' logical instances.

Returns:
Identifier.

Implements DRMPlugin::MPEG2IPMPXDRMPlugin::IPMPAgent.

ByteSeq &  in,
ByteSeq &  out
)  [protected]
 

Process (one) input message and return response.

Warning:
This function must be thread safe.

Response may be empty, if none was created.

Input message data is modified.

Parameters:
sender input, sender's code.
in input, input message data.
out output, response message data.
Returns:
Boolean indicating success or failure.
